summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Upstate Hot Tubs website. Verified all requested features including hero layout, product gallery, About page Grand Opening image, mobile video autoplay, OG meta tags, and contact form Netlify integration. Most functionality working correctly with minor external image loading issues.

ui_bugs.issue: Popup overlay occasionally interferes with UI interactions, preventing clicks on product cards and mobile menu

integration_issues.issue: Some swim spa images from vikingspas.com domain are broken (7 images), but fallback to logo works correctly

passed_tests: Hero section shows 'AMERICAN MADE' text before logo
About page displays Grand Opening image at top
Product cards show side view as default thumbnail
Product modal has Side View and Overhead View tabs
Videos have webkit-playsinline='true' for mobile autoplay
Open Graph meta image uses new logo
Contact form has proper Netlify attributes
Product cards have swipe arrows and image dots
Image fallback to logo works for broken images
action_item_for_main_agent: Consider reducing z-index or improving popup timing to prevent UI interaction blocking. Replace broken vikingspas.com image URLs with working alternatives or remove problematic swim spa products.
